Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class RemoteAction.Data

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.RemoteAction.Data
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    RemoteAction
    public static class RemoteAction.Data
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains all the possible targets available to the user when they choose to use this action
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      boolean canBeDone
      Boolean parameter which represents whether the action can be concluded.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> discardableAmmos
      List of ammos the user can use to discard as a way to pay a cost
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> discardablePowerUps
      List of powerups the user can use to discard as a way to pay a cost
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> possiblePlayers
      List of players the user can target with the selected action
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> possiblePowerUps
      List of powerups the user can target with the selected action
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleSquares
      List of squares the user can target with the selected action
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleWeapons
      List of loaded weapons the user can choose to fire with after choosing a "shooting" action.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Data

        public Data​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> possiblePlayers,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleSquares,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> possiblePowerUps,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> discardablePowerUps,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> discardableAmmos,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleWeapons,
            boolean canBeDone)
        Contrsuctor. Sets all the parameter listed below with the values/lists goteen as input
        Parameters:
        possiblePlayers - List of players the user can target with the selected action
        possibleSquares - List of squares the user can target with the selected action
        possiblePowerUps - List of powerups the user can target with the selected action
        discardablePowerUps - List of powerups the user discard to pay a cost
        discardableAmmos - List of ammos the user discard to pay a cost
        possibleWeapons - List of loaded weapons the user can use to fire after choosing a "shooting" weapon
        canBeDone - Boolean which represents whether or not the action can be concluded without taking further basic steps.
